actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to suspend until the close of January 3, 1979, the rate of duty on menadione dimethylpyrimidinol bisulphite (MPB).

summary.text: Suspends, under the Tariff Schedules of the U.S., until the close of January 3, 1979, the rate of duty on menadione dimethylpyrimidinol bisulphite (MPB).

titles.title: A bill to suspend until the close of January 3, 1979, the rate of duty on menadione dimethylpyrimidinol bisulphite (MPB).
